Room.Name: Harvest Circle
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the northern section of the the large Harvest Circle.
Room.LongDescription: The Harvest Circle marks the center of the town of Oceancrest. It connects Necropolis Avenue, running north and south, with Oceancrest Avenue, running east and west through the center of the city. The Harvest Circle more or less gets its name because every autumn, the town gathers at the Circle in celebration of the end of the harvesting season.
